thread.title: Second person nabbed for child porn involving firefighter | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Second person nabbed for child porn involving firefighter | Daily Mail Online

author: Snejana Farberov For Dailymail.Com
title: Second person nabbed for child porn involving firefighter | Daily Mail Online
text: Mother-of-two is charged in child pornography case involving an ex-firefighter who dressed as clown for kid-safety program Melissa Skelton, 36, charged with child sexual abuse and conspiracy to commit sexual abuse Divorced mom-of-two is accused of letting ex-firefighter Zackery Perry to molest six-year-old girl in her case Perry, 30, was arrested in January for suspected possession of child porn, distributing porn, child sexual exploitation and crimes against nature Perry was part of Muskogee Fire Department's Clown Society, performing skits about fire safety for children under stage name 'Scooter' Police allegedly recovered 1,378 images and videos from Perry's cellphone He is also accused of being involved in production of video depicting sex acts between a woman and a dog Published: 14:47 GMT, 9 February 2017 | Updated: 00:22 GMT, 10 February 2017 112 shares
